name: S T A Y H O M E vol 1
name_original: S T A Y H O M E vol 1
description:
S T A Y H O M E (vol 1) is about doing just that.

spend time in a fantasy washroom;

flush the toilet, run the bath, clean yr teeth;
or don't.

watch the days go by; listen to the breeze;
remember the last time it rained like this

the first volume in a series of tiny reflections on home-space & belonging.
